content: Stream created by Mark Roberts.

We can discuss updates to the IG here.
The PSS can be found here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/ATT/PSS+for+CARIN+IG+for+Digital+Insurance+Card
The Confluence page can be found here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/CAR/CARIN+IG+for+Digital+Insurance+Card

Excited about the new Digital Insurance Card work. Would have been really useful on Monday of this week when I had been to the doctor and needed some quick lab work, but I didn't have my insurance card with me. When evaluating the hassle of paying out of pocket and filing the claim myself versus going home and coming back later... I went with the latter. A digital card could have saved me a trip for sure! Until this work is complete I need to at least store a picture of the card on my phone :)
